snippet: The sequel to Hilary Mantel’s acclaimed “Wolf Hall” focuses on Thomas Cromwell’s machinations in the Tudor court of Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn.
abstract: Janet Maslin reviews book Bring Up the Bodies by Hilary Mantel.
lead_paragraph: The sequel to Hilary Mantel’s acclaimed “Wolf Hall” focuses on Thomas Cromwell’s machinations in the Tudor court of Henry VIII and Anne Boleyn.

headline.seo: ‘Bring Up the Bodies,’ a ‘Wolf Hall’ Sequel by Hilary Mantel
headline.main: A Canny Henchman, Targeting the Queen
headline.print_headline: A Canny Henchman, Targeting The Queen
